name: Divide And Profit
description:
Divide And Profit

A pair of aliens with an uncanny resemblence to humans have landed on an uncharted planet. There's just one difference, they can infinitely reproduce.... 

As the player, your job is to guide these creatures into creating a new society, with jobs, shops, and more to come! How long can you survive without going bankrupt, or worse, extinct?

This game is currently in active development for the 1.1 version

Report Any Bugs or Recomendations Via Comments Or Reviews Please

Alot of work on this game, as well as updates on releases, will be posted youtube, and you may be able to catch some development over on twitch, so come join if your interested!

Happy Gaming!
